All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
CurveTrackGraphics, EmptyTrackGraphics, GeneListTrackGraphics, NucleotideListTrackGraphics, RepeatFamilyListTrackGraphics, RulerGraphics
public abstract class TrackGraphics
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, GenomeWindowModifier

Graphics part of a track

Version:
0.1
Author:
Julien Lajugie

Serialized Form

Nested Class Summary
private  class TrackGraphics.ScrollModeThread
          The ScrollModeThread class is used to scroll the track horizontally when the scroll mode is on (ie when the middle button of the mouse is clicked)

scoreToColor

protected java.awt.Color scoreToColor(double score,
                                      double min,
                                      double max)
Returns a color associated to a score. High intensities are red. Medium are green. Low are blue.

Parameters:
score - A score indexed between min and max.
min - minimum intensity value
max - maximum intensity value
Returns:
A color
